HEAD.title: Pennsylvania Spatial Data Access | Full Metadata

BODY.H2: Biofuel Feedstock Potential in the Chesapeake Bay - Rye, Barley and Switchgrass

DL.DD: Biofuel Feedstock Potential in the Chesapeake Bay - Rye, Barley and Switchgrass

DIV.PRE: This layer shows the potential production of biofuel feedstocks, such as winter rye and barley on corn and soybean cropland, and switchgrass on failed, idle, fallow and abandoned cropland. Areas and corresponding crop production totals are aggregated by HUC6 watershed boundaries for the Chesapeake Bay.

This dataset is intended to illustrate the potential for biofuel production in the Chesapeake Bay, in a manner that does not compete with current food or fiber production. This data was used in support of a Chesapeake Bay Commission report titled: "Chesapeake Biofuel Policies: Balancing Energy, Economy and Environment" published in 2010.

DD.DL:
Map_Projection_Name:Albers Conical Equal Area
Albers_Conical_Equal_Area: Albers Conical Equal AreaStandard_Parallel:40.000000Standard_Parallel:42.000000Longitude_of_Central_Meridian:-78.000000Latitude_of_Projection_Origin:39.000000False_Easting:0.000000False_Northing:0.000000

DL.DD: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

DIV.PRE: Cropland on which all crops failed (acres)
Cropland idle or used for cover crops (acres)
Soybean land minus small grain land (acres)
Adjusted Small Grain area estimated to be planted as double crops following corn (hectares)
Adjusted Small Grain area estimated to be planted as double crops following soybeans (hectares)
Net corn area available after removing the adjusted small grain area (CRNGRNHA - CRNSMGRN) (hectares)
Net soybean area available after removing the adjusted small grain area (SOYBNHA - SOYSMGRN) (hectares)
Rye Yield on corn grain land (Mg/ha)
Total rye production on corn land multiplied by a 0.6 factor to compensate for overconfident rye yield model. (Mg)
Total rye production on soybean land multiplied by a 0.6 factor to compensate for overconfident rye yield model. (Mg)
Cropland on which all crops failed (ha)
Low range switchgrass production on failed cropland multiplied by a 0.4 factor to account for over confident model. (Mg)
High range switchgrass production on failed cropland multiplied by a 0.75 factor to account for over confident model. (Mg)
Low range switchgrass production on idle cropland multiplied by a 0.4 factor to account for over confident model. (Mg)
High range switchgrass production on idle cropland multiplied by a 0.75 factor to account for over confident model. (Mg)
Low range switchgrass production on fallow cropland multiplied by a 0.4 factor to account for over confident model. (Mg)
High range switchgrass production on fallow cropland multiplied by a 0.75 factor to account for over confident model. (Mg)
Rye Production on Corn land multiplied by a .40 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Rye Production on Corn land multiplied by a .60 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Rye Production on Soybean land multiplied by a .40 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Rye Production on Soybean land multiplied by a .60 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Switchgrass Production on failed cropland multiplied by a .30 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Switchgrass Production on failed cropland multiplied by a .50 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Switchgrass Production on idle cropland multiplied by a .30 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Switchgrass Production on idle cropland multiplied by a .50 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Switchgrass Production on fallow cropland multiplied by a .30 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Switchgrass Production on fallow cropland multiplied by a .50 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Barley grain production on corn and soybean land adjusted by a .4 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Barley grain production on corn and soybean land adjusted by a .6 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Barley straw production on corn and soybean land adjusted by a .4 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Barley straw production on corn and soybean land adjusted by a .6 "willingness to manage" factor. (Mg)
Sum of total corn and soy land area. (Ha)
Former agricultural land abandonded sometime since 1969 and not currently urban. (Ha)
Former agricultural land abandonded sometime since 1969 and not currently urban. (acres)
